keyMoments.title: Lola's Debut as Zombie Bride
keyMoments.description: Lola, a zombie warthog bride, appears for the first time and aggressively pursues Absalom with marriage proposals, using kisses, bear hugs, and suplexes.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Lola as a wild zombie with Charlotte Lola's shadow, setting up her role in the Thriller Bark arc and future revelations about her connection to Big Mom.

keyMoments.title: Lola Learns of Absalom's Chosen Bride
keyMoments.description: After being rejected by Absalom, Lola learns he has chosen Nami as his bride. Enraged, she vows to destroy Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up conflict between Lola and Nami, though this later evolves into an unlikely friendship.

abilities.description: Bridal Martial Arts - combat techniques that express affection, including powerful tackles and throws.
Sealing Kiss - Lola's signature technique attempting to kiss her target with tremendous force.

relationships.description: Lola is obsessed with marrying Absalom, though he rejects her advances.

evolutionMoments.description: Lola pursues Absalom aggressively with marriage proposals.

relationships.description: Initially views Nami as a rival after learning Absalom chose her as his bride.

evolutionMoments.description: Lola vows to destroy Nami after seeing her picture.

reveals.information: A zombie warthog animated by Charlotte Lola's shadow

keyMoments.title: Inuppe's Debut
keyMoments.description: Inuppe, a penguin-dog zombie hybrid, appears in Perona's Wonder Garden, immediately displaying behavior reminiscent of Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of a zombie animated by Sanji's shadow, demonstrating how shadows carry personality traits.

keyMoments.title: Inuppe's Chivalrous Nature Revealed
keyMoments.description: Inuppe kicks Gallant Hippo away to protect Nami, declaring he would rather die than harm a woman, showcasing Sanji's core personality trait.
keyMoments.significance: Proves that zombies inherit fundamental personality traits from their shadow donors, establishing a key mechanic of Gecko Moria's powers.
keyMoments.quote: I would rather die than kick a woman!

abilities.description: Fights exclusively using powerful kicks inherited from Sanji's shadow, strong enough to shatter swords and send opponents flying.

relationships.description: Animated by Sanji's shadow, inheriting his fighting style and chivalrous nature.

evolutionMoments.description: Inuppe displays Sanji's refusal to harm women.

relationships.description: Refuses to harm Nami and actively protects her from other zombies.

evolutionMoments.description: Inuppe kicks Gallant Hippo to protect Nami from attack.

reveals.information: A penguin-dog zombie hybrid animated by Sanji's shadow
Inherited Sanji's chivalrous code of never harming women

keyMoments.title: Target of Absalom's Marriage Plans
keyMoments.description: Absalom reveals to Lola that he has chosen Nami to be his bride, making her a target.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up a major conflict in the Thriller Bark arc where Nami must escape Absalom's wedding plans.

keyMoments.title: Escape to Perona's Wonder Garden
keyMoments.description: Nami escapes from a coffin with Usopp and Chopper and finds herself in Perona's Wonder Garden surrounded by animal zombies.
keyMoments.significance: Separates Nami from the main group, placing her in direct danger.

keyMoments.title: Protected by Inuppe
keyMoments.description: Inuppe defends Nami from Gallant Hippo, refusing to allow any harm to come to her due to Sanji's shadow.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the unexpected benefit of Sanji's shadow being in a zombie - it protects Nami even when Sanji isn't present.

relationships.description: Absalom has chosen Nami as his unwilling bride.

evolutionMoments.description: Absalom reveals his intention to marry Nami.

relationships.description: Lola sees Nami as a rival for Absalom's affection.

evolutionMoments.description: Lola vows to destroy Nami after learning she is Absalom's chosen bride.

keyMoments.title: Escape to Wonder Garden
keyMoments.description: Usopp awakens in a coffin and escapes with Nami and Chopper into Perona's Wonder Garden.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the separated trio facing zombie dangers.
keyMoments.quote: Where are we? What is this place?

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Awakens in Coffin First
keyMoments.description: Chopper wakes up first when the zombie squirrels trip, leading to the trio's escape into Perona's Wonder Garden.
keyMoments.significance: Chopper's awakening triggers their escape from captivity.

keyMoments.title: Battles Wild Zombies
keyMoments.description: Chopper fights multiple animal zombies to protect Nami and Usopp in the garden.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's protective nature and combat abilities against zombie animals.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Goes Missing
keyMoments.description: While exploring the mansion with Luffy, Robin, and Franky, Zoro mysteriously vanishes from the group.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Zoro's solo encounter with the legendary samurai zombie Ryuma, a pivotal fight in the Thriller Bark arc.
